summary: Contributor requests a contributing guide for the Ruby SDK to understand how to build and contribute to the project. The maintainer indicates that development instructions exist in the README but suggests joining Slack for further guidance and points to the samples-ruby repository for contribution opportunities.
userImpact: New contributors cannot easily understand how to set up and contribute to the Ruby SDK without external guidance.
proposedFix: Create a contributing.md file or update the README development section with current Ruby version requirements and contribution guidelines.
workaround: Refer to README development section, check CI runs, or join Slack #ruby-sdk channel for guidance.
keyQuote: In the absence of a full contribution guide during the alpha period of the SDK, we have the "Development" section of the README
